graph_title: Average age of mothers at first birth
indicator_name: Average age of mothers at first birth
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office for Disaster Reduction (UNISDR)
title: Untitled
national_indicator_description: The average age of the mother at first birth (live birth) is considered to be the average age of the mother at the birth of her first child. For the observed calendar year, the average age at first birth is calculated from specific fertility rates at first birth.
